entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers early this evening with risk of thunderstorms. Snow level near valley bottom. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 1 April 2023
